org.livingdoc.converters

Class TypeConverters

  • org.livingdoc.converters.TypeConverters

  • public class TypeConverters

    Utility object providing interface TypeConverter related operations.

    See Also:
    interface TypeConverter

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static TypeConverters INSTANCE

        Utility object providing interface TypeConverter related operations.

        See Also:
        interface TypeConverter

    • Method Detail

      • findTypeConverterForGenericElement

        @NotNull
public TypeConverter<?> findTypeConverterForGenericElement(@NotNull
                                                                    java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement element,
                                                                    int parameterIndex,
                                                                    @Nullable
                                                                    java.lang.Class<?> documentClass)

        Tries to find a interface TypeConverter for the ParameterizedTypes appropriate for the given generic AnnotatedElement.

        Type converters are found by either analyzing the given Field or Parameter for its ParameterizedTypes, delegating the search for the appropriate interface TypeConverter of the found ParameterizedType to findTypeConverter.

        1. check if inferred annotated element is field or parameter

        2. get the target type by extracting the actualTypeArguments

        3. call the appropriate method

        Parameters:
        element - the annotated or inferred element
        parameterIndex - the index for the parameterized type for which we search the typeconverter
        documentClass - the (optional) document class
        Returns:
        the found type converter
        Throws:
        error - if the element is neither Field nor Parameter
        NoTypeConverterFoundException - if no appropriate typeconverter could be found
        See Also:
        interface TypeConverter, ParameterizedType, AnnotatedElement, Field, Parameter, ParameterizedType, interface TypeConverter, ParameterizedType, findTypeConverter

      • findTypeConverter

        @Nullable
public TypeConverter<?> findTypeConverter(@NotNull
                                                    java.lang.reflect.Parameter parameter,
                                                    @Nullable
                                                    java.lang.Class<?> documentClass)

        Tries to find a interface TypeConverter for the given Parameter.

        Type converters can be configured by annotating either the parameter, the parameter's method, the fixture class or the document binding class with annotationclass Converter. This is also the order in which this method searches for a matching type converter:

        1. check for parameter annotations

        2. check for method annotations

        3. check for class annotations

        4. check (optional) document class annotations

        5. check default type converter list

        Parameters:
        parameter - the parameter
        documentClass - the (optional) document class
        Returns:
        the found type converter or null if no matching converter was found
        See Also:
        interface TypeConverter, Parameter, annotationclass Converter

      • findTypeConverter

        @Nullable
public TypeConverter<?> findTypeConverter(@NotNull
                                                    java.lang.reflect.Field field,
                                                    @Nullable
                                                    java.lang.Class<?> documentClass)

        Tries to find a interface TypeConverter for the given Field.

        Type converters can be configured by annotating either the field, the fixture class or the document binding class with annotationclass Converter. This is also the order in which this method searches for a matching type converter:

        1. check for field annotations

        2. check for class annotations

        3. check (optional) document class annotations

        4. check default type converter list

        Parameters:
        field - the field
        documentClass - the (optional) document class
        Returns:
        the found type converter or null if no matching converter was found
        See Also:
        interface TypeConverter, Field, annotationclass Converter
